entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.49 [$0.39 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.49

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö$17.99 ‚Üí $8.99 [$8.99 ~ $17.99]
  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö$29.99 ‚Üí $12.99 [$12.99 ~ $29.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö$8.99
  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö$12.99
  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö$0.99
  • Raider WeeklyÔºö$1.99

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: DotInk: EInk Assistant
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly ProÔºö$5.99
  • Lifetime ProÔºö$14.99
  • Monthly ProÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Designed for e-ink enthusiasts, making your portable readers more powerful and easier to use. Seamlessly convert .ttf fonts and e-books on your phone into .bin fonts, XTC, or EPUB formats perfectly tuned for portable e-ink screens. [CORE FEATURES] ‚Ä¢ WYSIWYG Font Customization Import external .ttf fonts or use system fonts. Adjust line spacing, tracking, size, weight, and more with precision. Real-time simulation of various e-ink screens‚Äîpreview exactly how it looks before exporting. ‚Ä¢ Powerful E-book Toolbox Import various e-book formats to preview layouts directly on your phone. Customize formatting and convert to standard formats with a single tap. ‚Ä¢ Seamless Device Integration Wireless connection to supported devices for font pushing and file management. Supported Devices: XTEInk X4, EDCBook, Murphy 3.7, Wudada¬∑Little Ink, and more. ‚Ä¢ Privacy First & Offline 100% Offline: All processing is done locally on your device. No user data is ever uploaded. (Note: Network and Location permissions are required solely for connecting to your e-ink hardware.) [NOTE FROM DEVELOPER] This app is an indie project built with "AI Vibe Coding." While I strive for perfection, I cannot test every scenario. If you encounter any bugs, I appreciate your understanding. Thank you to all the "Community Supporters" for your feedback! Feel free to leave suggestions or comments. Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Application Description

„Äê‰∏ªË¶ÅÁâπËâ≤„Äë 1„ÄÅÂè§ËØóÊñá„ÄÅÂè§Á±çÁâπÂà´ÂÖ®ÔºåÂàÜÁ±ªËØ¶ÁªÜ 2„ÄÅÊ≥®ÈáäÁøªËØëËß£ÊûêË¥®ÈáèÊ≤âÂÆûÔºåÊúâÊãºÈü≥ÊâπÊ≥®Êñπ‰æøÊü•ÁúãÔºåËøòÊúâÊúóËØª 3„ÄÅÂÜÖÂÆπÊùÉÂ®ÅÔºåÊñáÁåÆËØÅÊòéÔºåÂÜÖÂµåÂ≠óÂÖ∏ÔºåËµèÊûêÂà∞‰Ωç 4„ÄÅÁïåÈù¢ÁÆÄÊ¥ÅÊ∏ÖÊñ∞ÂæàÊúâ‰ª£ÂÖ•ÊÑü 5„ÄÅÂäüËÉΩÂÆûÁî®Âø´Êç∑„ÄÅÊµèËßà‰∏ùÊªëÊñπ‰æøÔºåÂàÜÂ±è‰æøÊç∑ÔºåÊêúÁ¥¢ËøÖÈÄüÔºåÂºïÂØºÂêàÁêÜ „ÄêÂ≠¶ÁîüÂÖöÂøÖÂ§á„Äë Âè§ÊñáÂ∏¶ÊãºÈü≥+Áúü‰∫∫ÊúóËØªÔºåÊñáË®ÄÊñáÁ™ÅÂáªÁ•ûÂô® ‰∏≠È´òËÄÉÈ´òÈ¢ëËÄÉÁÇπËØóËØç‰∏ÄÈîÆÊî∂ËóèÔºåÊîØÊåÅ‰∏ãËΩΩ „ÄêÊñáËâ∫Áà±Â•ΩËÄÖ‰∏ìÂ±û„Äë ÊØèÊó•Êé®ÈÄÅÔºåAIÁÆóÊ≥ïÂåπÈÖç‰Ω†ÁöÑÂÆ°ÁæéÂÅèÂ•Ω ËæπÂê¨ÊúóËØµ„ÄäÈïøÁõ∏ÊÄù„ÄãÔºåËæπËµè‰ΩïÂΩìÂÖ±Ââ™Ë•øÁ™óÁÉõÔºåÂç¥ËØùÂ∑¥Â±±Â§úÈõ®Êó∂ „ÄêÂ≠¶ÊúØÁ†îÁ©∂Âà©Âô®„Äë Êî∂ÂΩï100‰∏á+ÊñáÁåÆËµÑÊñôÔºåÂê´„ÄäÂõõÂ∫ìÂÖ®‰π¶„Äã Êô∫ËÉΩÂØπÊØî‰∏çÂêåÁâàÊú¨Ê≥®ÈáäÔºåÊñáÁåÆÊ∫ØÊ∫êÊùÉÂ®Å ÂõõÂ§ßÊ†∏ÂøÉÁ´û‰∫âÂäõ ‚ë† ÊúÄÂÖ®ÊñáÂ∫ìÔºöË¶ÜÁõñÂÖàÁß¶Ëá≥ÊòéÊ∏Ö2‰∏á+‰ΩúËÄÖ‰ΩúÂìÅ ‚ë° Á≤æÂáÜËß£ÊûêÔºöÈôÑ„ÄêÂàõ‰ΩúËÉåÊôØ„Äë„ÄêÊñáË®ÄËØ≠Ê≥ï„Äë„ÄêÂÖ∏ÊïÖÊ∫ØÊ∫ê„Äë‰∏âÁª¥Ëß£ËØª ‚ë¢ ‰∫íÈªëÁßëÊäÄÔºöÂàÜÂ±èÂØπÁÖßÔºàÂéüÊñá/ËØëÊñá/Ê≥®Èáä/ËµèÊûê/ÊãºÈü≥Ëá™Áî±ÁªÑÂêàÔºâ ‚ë£ Èõ∂Âπ≤Êâ∞‰ΩìÈ™åÔºöÊ≤âÊµ∏ÂºèÈòÖËØª „ÄêËÆ¢ÈòÖÂèäÂçïË¥≠ËØ¥Êòé„Äë ‰∏Ä„ÄÅÈáëÁ¥´‰ºöÂëòËá™Âä®ËÆ¢ÈòÖËØ¥Êòé 1. entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö$9.99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Today‚Äôs Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization ‚Ä¢ Unlimited notes storage ‚Ä¢ Multiple note colors ‚Ä¢ Pinned & private notes ‚Ä¢ Custom font styles & font sizes ‚Ä¢ Sort notes by name or date ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time ‚Ä¢ Easy note sharing ‚Ä¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security ‚Ä¢ App lock with multiple passcode options ‚Ä¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync ‚Ä¢ iCloud sync for notes ‚Ä¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications ‚Ä¢ Widget for today‚Äôs notes ‚Ä¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager ‚Ä¢ Create and manage PDF files ‚Ä¢ Edit existing PDFs ‚Ä¢ Export notes as PDF ‚Ä¢ Share PDFs easily ‚Ä¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs ‚Ä¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. We‚Äôre committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

entry.title: Titan Quest HD
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $2.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.99

In-App Purchases

  • Immortal Throne DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Ragnar√∂k DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Atlantis DLCÔºö$4.99
  • Eternal Embers DLCÔºö$4.99

Application Description

One of the best hack-and-slash games of all time now fits in your pocket! Originally released on PC in 2006, Titan Quest is an action RPG set against a mythological backdrop. The Titans have escaped from prison and are hell-bent on destroying the Earth. The Gods alone can‚Äôt stop them -- a hero is needed to lead this epic struggle. Victory or defeat will determine humanity‚Äôs fate and that of the Olympians. You are that hero! Create your character, explore ancient civilizations like Greece, Egypt, Babylon, and China, and fight against hordes of legendary creatures! Master the arts of archery, swordsmanship or magic and upgrade your character to unlock awesome powers! Discover special items to help you complete your quest: legendary swords, devastating thunderbolts, enchanted bows, and much more! Specially adapted for mobile devices, this new version offers numerous new features: ‚óè A new touch-friendly interface ‚óè Completely redesigned touch-friendly gameplay ‚óè High-quality graphics ‚óè A huge, open world to explore ‚óè Full day/night cycle ‚óè 80 different mythological creatures: Minotaurs, Cyclopses, Gorgons, and many more ‚óè 1200+ items to discover ‚óè 30 different character classes ‚óè 150 different character skills ‚óè Colossal playtime of more than 60 hours ‚óè Scalable difficulty modes: weapons and enemies match your skill level ‚óè Dozens of unlockable achievements to discover ‚óè No ads, no microtransactions. Mixing ancient mythology with non-stop action, Titan Quest is a classic hack-and-slash offering energizing gameplay with a fast, intense rhythm. Overcome thrilling challenges and vanquish the greatest enemies ever to invade the mobile world! DLCs available as in-app purchase: ‚óè IMMORTAL THRONE - Encounter the greatest villains of Greek mythology, brave the attacks of Cerberus, and hazard the banks of the River Styx to conquer this dark new adventure. ‚óè RAGNAR√ñK - In the uncharted lands of northern Europe, you‚Äôll brave the realms of the Celts, the Northmen, and the Asgardian gods! ‚óè ATLANTIS - Set out on a journey across the western Mediterranean, in search of the mythical kingdom of Atlantis. Including the Tartarus Arena for epic battles! ‚óè ETERNAL EMBERS - Summoned by the legendary Emperor Yao, the Hero is called back into the East to deal with a demonic threat that has been ravaging the land after the Telkine was slain.

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$7.99

Application Description

Take to the battlefield with Wargroove, the award-winning strategy game - now on mobile! Play solo or with friends with Local & Online Multiplayer. Choose your Commander and wage turn-based war on battling factions. Design and share maps, cutscenes and campaigns with easy-to-use editors and in-depth customization tools! Wargroove 2: Pocket Edition offers retro turn-based tactical combat on the go, bringing the latest and greatest entry in the series, Wargroove 2, to mobile devices, with fully optimised and intuitive touchscreen controls - ready to play anywhere! GAME FEATURES ‚ñ† Trouble stirs in Aurania - battle your way through a 20-hour Campaign, with 3 interweaving stories! ‚ñ† Experience a new story with retro-inspired turn-based tactics gameplay of Wargroove - now on mobile! ‚ñ† Battle with or against friends with Local Multiplayer - just pass the device & play! ‚ñ† Online Multiplayer up to 4 players, cross-platform play to other versions of Wargroove 2 ‚ñ† A vibrant cast of 20+ Commanders & 6 warring Factions ‚ñ† Unique ultimate moves! Unleash your Commander‚Äôs powerful Groove ability to turn the tide of battle. ‚ñ† Create, customize and share with in-depth customisation tools ‚ñ† Lead a roguelike conquest! A challenging game mode dedicated to putting your tactical abilities to the test ‚ñ† Build your army and refine your strategy with unique unit types, maximise your army‚Äôs impact with critical moves ‚ñ† Play with up two four players locally or online! Simply pass the device around or connect online with cross-platform play.

entry.title: This Is the Police 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

IMPORTANT DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff‚Äôs department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions ‚Äì and try to keep out of prison yourself! ‚Äì in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat. Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It‚Äôs all of these, and more! Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience. Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn‚Äôt spiral out of control. Take charge of the Sheriff‚Äôs department. Your subordinates aren‚Äôt just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices ‚Äì and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You‚Äôll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department. Engage in tactical combat. During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment ‚Äì if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn‚Äôt have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life. Become a true detective. Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought. Thank you for playing ‚ÄòTHIS IS THE POLICE 2‚Äô! entry.title: Aces of the Luftwaffe Squadron
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $7.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

The Squadron has reached your mobile device! Dodge a bullet storm and face fearsome aerial war machines! Lead your squadron to victory in two different campaigns, full of story twists and legendary boss fights! ACES OF THE LUFTWAFFE - SQUADRON is an action-packed vertical scrolling shoot‚Äò em-up with a fascinating and fully voiced narrative. Dodge bullets, collect massive power-ups and wisely use special abilities to defeat your enemies. Two campaigns with 50 levels in total, waves of various deadly enemies and a lot of epic boss fights. Are you up to this task? When Europe seemed to be free, a secret German commando called The Aces of the Luftwaffe took their chance to strike back and invade the USA! It‚Äôs your duty to restore peace and liberty aboard deadly wings of steel in bombastic air battles! However, every story has two sides. While the Aces of Luftwaffe begin their assault on the United States, you are charged with leading a squad of elite German pilots on a secret mission. Embarc on an epic aerial adventure of intrigue and deceit from a secret base in the Bermuda Triangle. Choose your side, decide your role and take off! - Action-packed Shoot ‚Äôem up with explosive special effects - Heroic NPC wingmen that will follow your order - Skill trees with individual abilities for each wingman - Challenging achievement system - Captivating storyline with fully voiced characters - 50 levels and exciting missions¬† - 12 spectacular boss fights - Epic movie-like orchestral soundtrack

Application Description

The battle continues after ‚Äú1941 Frozen Front‚Äù ‚Äì and this time, it‚Äôs all about naval warfare! Join the navy and fight to win the battle of your life! Own the battlefield and send your soldiers to the frontline. Military combat at its best! Choose the right tactics and use your commando to defeat the enemy! Lead the U.S. Army on their campaign or command the Japanese forces on their mission! Take out enemy alliances with infantry, artillery, tanks, warplanes, battleships and submarines and earn your stripes as an ingenious commander at the PACIFIC FRONT! *** MISSION BRIEFING *** FIGHT with powerful weapons like torpedos and bombs! TAKE OUT enemy positions with tanks and infantry! BOMBARD hostile headquarters with mighty bomber wings! SURPRISE the enemy with attacks from your submarine! EMPLACE your artillery in rough terrain! CLEAR beaches, lagoons and straits! AMBUSH the enemy! SUPPLY your army with goods and ammunition! DEFEND your aircraft carriers and battleships! Features: - PLAY WITHOUT ADS! - Turn-based strategy action set in WW2 - Thrilling campaigns and challenging missions - Historical U.S. and Japanese units - Infantry, artillery, tanks, warplanes, battleships and submarines for both fractions - Repairs, camouflage and fortification of units during the battles - Hot-hand multiplayer battles - Hex grid for the best overview possible - Detailed graphics and super-realistic sounds - Full tablet support Thank you for playing ‚Äò1942 Pacific Front‚Äô! ¬© www.handy-games.com GmbH

entry.title: Roundguard
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$6.99 ‚Üí $2.19 [$2.19 ~ $6.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$2.19

Application Description

Roundguard is a bouncy dungeon crawler with pinball physics, lots of loot, and a randomized castle full of oddballs. Highly-rated former Apple Arcade game and Mobile Game of the Year nominee! If you love roguelikes & Peggle, then Roundguard is for you. Press your luck against hordes of dangerously cute monsters and challenging roguelike elements in this all-round bouncy adventure! Bouncy Fun: Intuitive pinball physics-based gameplay like no other dungeon crawler. Multiple Classes: Play as the Warrior, the Rogue, the Wizard, or the Druid, each with their own unique skills, items, and cheeky sense of humor. Show Off Your Skills: Compete on the leaderboards and try to master all the challenging, rule-bending relics. Earn all the Encore roses in an escalating series of difficulty ranks for each hero. Daily Puzzles: A new short puzzle every day to test your skills. Weekly Runs: New special rules each week. Compete against the world on dedicated weekly leaderboards. Randomized Dungeon: Each time you play, levels are procedurally generated, and quest events and elite monsters are randomly placed. Permadeath with Benefits: When you die, you‚Äôll have a chance to bring a special trinket with you on your next run. The more gold you grab, the better your chances to collect one of the most powerful trinkets. A Cast of Oddballs: Chat with the castle‚Äôs colorful cast to pick up quests and learn why some rats want their king dead, what‚Äôs irritating the local teenage skeleton today, or what the Warrior will do if you can‚Äôt get to a bathroom quickly enough. Lots of Loot: Over 200 items and trinkets, each with effects that present strategic choices and combo possibilities.
